pending.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fax' || doc.folder != 'outbox' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.pvt_job_status != 'pending') return; emit(doc.pvt_created, null); }

processing_by_node.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'fax' || doc.folder != 'outbox' || doc.pvt_job_status != 'processing' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_job_node, null); }
